title: aliitp2
author: aliitp2
content: HelloDespite being mainly a miner and Strictly a BTC Hodler for over 2-3 Years, I am trying to discover new opportunities in the crypto Space to increase my income...1) I am considering Staking some crypto with Kraken.2) My main purpose for this thread is asking what do you guys think of something like "Sheesha Finance" ?...Am pretty new when it comes to all those terms in the crypto space: Defi, Crypto Projects, etc... But it was always my thought spotting good coins/projects and investing in them EARLY and earn some coins and sell once they take off !Is Sheesha my only option or any other good options out there ?As you can tell am keeping my options pretty limited, and only go with the most reliable Crypto Service, so I strictly Use Kraken as my main Exchange, and hate to tolerate Huge losses in this emerging crypto technology !...advises regarding Sheesha truly appreciated...thanks,

comments.author: goelK12
comments.body: I would love to know the answers about your questions as well.

comments.author: ANSEL_2.0
comments.body: Can you drop link to this project website? The one I could find is Nick and Henderson project called Sheesha finance, if it's the same then it looks promising but the founders aren't that a crypto expert, there are better startup projects you should look into for massive gains in future like Teller FinanceOctopus NetworkLayer ZeroSienna Network

comments.author: aliitp2
comments.body: Quote from: ANSEL_2.0 on August 29, 2022, 08:45:40 AMCan you drop link to this project website? The one I could find is Nick and Henderson project called Sheesha finance, if it's the same then it looks promising but the founders aren't that a crypto expert, there are better startup projects you should look into for massive gains in future like Teller FinanceOctopus NetworkLayer ZeroSienna Networkwww.sheeshafinance.io

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Decentralized Finance projects are quite not growing and only a few investors are willing to take risks with them and I see their value is declining due to low market demand. However, making a choice of those Defi projects that are currently working on is still a good option but not sure about the new one. Well, having viewed the sheesha finance is looks great and promising project but yes, it was more confident if we see this project is working already and see its results.

comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: Quote from: Kelvinid on August 29, 2022, 10:26:51 PMDecentralized Finance projects are quite not growing and only a few investors are willing to take risks with them and I see their value is declining due to low market demand. However, making a choice of those Defi projects that are currently working on is still a good option but not sure about the new one. Well, having viewed the sheesha finance is looks great and promising project but yes, it was more confident if we see this project is working already and see its results. if we take a look at well-known DeFi projects like pancakeswap, uniwap, avalanche we see that interest in DeFi has dropped dramatically...for anyone who wants to invest in a DeFi project now must be prepared with the slow growth of the assets you buy until waiting for the market (DeFi) to return to demand. I have visited the Seesha Finance website and saw that it came from Dubai (you can see it on the last line of the homepage), the potential is still not clear, whoever wants to invest in Sheesa Finance, do it with your own risk.

comments.author: minairia3
comments.body: Quote from: Renampun on August 29, 2022, 10:36:00 PMQuote from: Kelvinid on August 29, 2022, 10:26:51 PMDecentralized Finance projects are quite not growing and only a few investors are willing to take risks with them and I see their value is declining due to low market demand. However, making a choice of those Defi projects that are currently working on is still a good option but not sure about the new one. Well, having viewed the sheesha finance is looks great and promising project but yes, it was more confident if we see this project is working already and see its results. if we take a look at well-known DeFi projects like pancakeswap, uniwap, avalanche we see that interest in DeFi has dropped dramatically...for anyone who wants to invest in a DeFi project now must be prepared with the slow growth of the assets you buy until waiting for the market (DeFi) to return to demand. I have visited the Seesha Finance website and saw that it came from Dubai (you can see it on the last line of the homepage), the potential is still not clear, whoever wants to invest in Sheesa Finance, do it with your own risk.Defi will still be the future of crypto even though recent crashes have caused the defi market to drop significantly, to me it will continue to grow and improve a lot in the future. I also came across sheeshafinance.io, it seems to be a serious project but talking about its potential is difficult because projects like this will have to compete very strongly with older projects before it because the idea is not too new and not too groundbreaking.OP can invest but before thinking about profit should also consider the risk it brings, it's not like bitcoin will never crash.

comments.author: aliitp2
comments.body: Quote from: Renampun on August 29, 2022, 10:36:00 PMQuote from: Kelvinid on August 29, 2022, 10:26:51 PMDecentralized Finance projects are quite not growing and only a few investors are willing to take risks with them and I see their value is declining due to low market demand. I personally cant even digest the concept of DeFi tbh and i have argued once that WEB3 doesn't seem to be taking off steadily or fast enough, I guess once legislations are set for the crypto space things will change...thanks,

comments.author: pgbit
comments.body: Sheesha finance is a Defi staking protocol,And offering very good investment offers for its investors.its diversified your staking return and the best part of sheesha finance has multichain.they have Bep-20 binance Smart Chain.they have ERC-20.its diversified many others Blockchain like such a solenium,Matic.you can swap the token on pancak swap for the bep-20 and on the uniswap for the ERC 20.the benefit of staking is very high.You will not find another project like this anywhere that can give you so much profit۔sheesha finance BEP-20 market cap $2.06M.max supply 99,999.00.all time high us$ 358.43 and All time low  US$ 17.01.Shesha Finance is a leading Defi Mutual Fund.Shisha Finance Easily convertible assets can be used freely for maximum reward.so relax and earn with the sheesha finance platform.

However, making a choice of those Defi projects that are currently working on is still a good option but not sure about the new one. Well, having viewed the sheesha finance is looks great and promising project but yes, it was more confident if we see this project is working already and see its results. i have a feeling DeFi projects (which am not sure what they are) will take off once crypto has been regulated !also since this is bitcoin forums am just wondering how come no one suggested: "trustswap" which i personally came across after researching on my own !  thanks all,
